items.title: Read Queer Books. Abolish ICE.
items.description: Bid on signed queer books in this auction and you'll be helping to raise money for the organizations helping those affected by ICE raids.

items.title: Romance Tropes for Neurodivergent Readers
items.description: For neurodivergent readers, these small moments of accommodation and understanding can feel just as powerful as grand gestures.

items.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

items.description: From a Grammy Award-winning performer to a groundbreaking comics creator, here are three must-read celebrity memoirs out in 2026!

items.title: Neuromancer is Coming to Apple TV—and More SFF Links
items.description: William Gibson's Neuromancer is getting an Apple TV adaptation and a deluxe editions—plus more SFF links you should know about!
